lead_paragraph: An article on Wednesday about Tiger Woods’s victory at the Masters in 1997 referred incorrectly to a hug he gave his father after the victory. Their embrace, one of golf’s most enduring images, occurred when they were behind the 18th green, not the 18th tee.
